awd_titl_txt: Synthesis and Chemistry of Vinyl Peroxides
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal will study the unusual and rare class of peroxides that           have an o-o bond adjacent tot a carbon-carbon double bond.  This study          will complement previous work done on acyl and alkyl peroxides and              should provide fundamental knowledge in the area of oxygen - centered           radicals.  The proposal will also examine methods to generate vinyl             peroxides under mild conditions with subsequent study of their                  polymerization.                                                                                                                                                 The planning activities will include the following:                                                                                                               1) Literature search and consultation with senior researchers.                  2) Molecular orbital calculations.                                              3) Synthesis of vinyl peroxides.                                                4) Drafting MRI competitive proposal.
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM
